channel.title: STEVEM
channel.description: My name is Stevem, not STEVE, M. Stevemmmm as in Steven with an "m'. I make Video Essays about Animation History that focus on the old, obscure and Japanese. Sometimes I make videos about Japanese music. https://stevem.gimmeswag.com

item.title: Patlabor : A Complete Deep Dive
item.description:
A full retrospective of Mobile Police Patlabor, the classic mecha series as we look at the rise, fall & resurrection. Follow me on Twitter for Updates on Videos- https://twitter.com/the_stevem SUPPORT ME HERE- https://www.patreon.com/stevemmmmm AND HERE - paypal.me/stevemmmmm All Sources In the Pinned Comments https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dFUUp45buHRXqqjmB6qH-r0rJa8rYEek1Ahvnal4ZW8/edit?usp=sharing #patlabor #mecha #mamoruoshii 0:00 Origins 11:43 Movie 1 19:14 On Television 26:08 A Big Thank you 26:58 Patlabor 2 43:55 WXIII 46:47 Live Action 53:13 PATLABOR IS BACK
Corrections: 6:08 I meant 4800 yen 7:15 Patlabor Early Day was released in 1988
